comment: LED Light therapy found as named only Light therapy

disclaimerData.disclaimer:
Treatment Objective
The objective of light therapy is to address various skin concerns, enhance circulation, alleviate discomfort, and support healing through the application of specific light wavelengths. The therapy may be utilized for a range of conditions as advised by your practitioner.

Procedure Summary
During the session, a device emitting light will be directed at the target area. You may perceive a mild warming sensation, but the treatment should not be painful. The length of each session will be detailed by your practitioner.

Anticipated Advantages of Light Therapy

Improved skin clarity and smoothness
Reduced swelling and discomfort
Stimulated collagen synthesis
Accelerated healing of damaged skin

Possible Risks and Side Effects
While light therapy is generally considered safe, potential risks and side effects to be aware of include:

Mild skin irritation or redness
Increased sensitivity to light
Temporary skin dryness or flaking

Please notify your practitioner if you experience any discomfort during the treatment.

Contraindications
You should not undergo light therapy if you:

Are currently pregnant or breastfeeding
Have photosensitivity or are taking medications that increase light sensitivity
Have a personal history of skin cancer or active malignant skin lesions
Have certain medical conditions, such as epilepsy, that could be adversely affected by light exposure

Please inform your practitioner if any of the above conditions apply to you.

I confirm that I have been informed about all relevant aspects of this treatment and that I fully comprehend this advice. This includes information regarding:
- The reasons for undergoing the procedure and the desired results
- The inherent risks of the procedure itself
- The risks associated with declining the procedure
- Any risks specific to my personal health
- The anticipated benefits of the treatment
- Potential drawbacks or disadvantages
- Alternative treatments and their advantages and disadvantages, including the choice to have no treatment
- Any uncertainties and the probability of a successful outcome
- Any follow-up care that might be necessary

MEDICAL IMAGERY: I authorize the taking of clinical photographs and videos. I understand these will become part of my confidential medical records.

I have been asked what information I require to make an informed decision and have had the opportunity to discuss my goals in detail.

I certify that I have read this consent, understand it fully, have had ample opportunity for discussion, and all my questions have been answered to my satisfaction. No new information has come to light that affects my decision to undergo treatment or provide consent. I hereby consent to this procedure. This document constitutes the complete disclosure and supersedes any prior verbal or written information.

All deposits and booking fees are non-refundable unless otherwise agreed with the practitioner.

questions.content: Do you comprehend the details that have been given to you?
Do you believe enough information has been shared to allow you to give informed consent?
Have you given your consent voluntarily?
Are there any health issues you currently have?
Are you currently pregnant or nursing a child?
Do you suffer from a neuromuscular disorder (such as Multiple Sclerosis, ALS, motor neuropathy, myasthenia gravis, or Lambert-Eaton syndrome)?
Do you have an autoimmune condition?
Do you experience any skin problems?
Do you have any known allergies or a history of severe allergic reactions (anaphylaxis)?
Is there an active infection at the area where the procedure is planned?
Are you currently on any antibiotics or other prescribed medications?
Is there any other Medical or Social History we should be aware of? If yes, please explain in detail.
What are your goals and desired results for undergoing this procedure? Please elaborate.
Have you undergone this or a comparable treatment previously? If so, were there any issues? Please provide details.
Do you have any concerns? If so, please describe them.
Is there anything else we need to know? Please provide full information.
I will keep this information for the duration of my treatment and consult it as needed.
